      • ratio

        public android.graphics.Bitmap ratio(java.lang.String imgPath,
                                     float pixelW,
                                     float pixelH)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Compress image by pixel, this will modify image width/height. Used to get thumbnail
        参数:
        imgPath - image path
        pixelW - target pixel of width
        pixelH - target pixel of height
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • compressAndGenImage

        public void compressAndGenImage(android.graphics.Bitmap image,
                                java.lang.String outPath,
                                int maxSize)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Compress by quality, and generate image to the path specified
        参数:
        maxSize - target will be compressed to be smaller than this size.(kb)
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • compressAndGenImage

        public void compressAndGenImage(java.lang.String imgPath,
                                java.lang.String outPath,
                                int maxSize,
                                boolean needsDelete)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Compress by quality, and generate image to the path specified
        参数:
        maxSize - target will be compressed to be smaller than this size.(kb)
        needsDelete - Whether delete original file after compress
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
